name: Dog Translator - Game for Dogs
description:
Bring new experience to relationship with your dog using Dog Translator. Talk to your pet, play bark sounds to see the reaction and train your pet using whistle. Communication with your dog will never be the same. Make fun and get closer to your dog playing Dog Translator game with your pet.

 Dog Translator Game Content & Main Features:
– Bark Sounds Gallery – tap bark sound to play and wait for your pet's reaction to understand what sounds he likes and which ones are better not to play;
– Human to Dog Translator Simulator – talk to your dog without language barrier; 
– Whistle – train your dog with an ultrasonic whistle and learn how to train your pet using it; 
– 50+ Dog Bark Sounds with regularly updates;
– No ads!

Disclaimer: This game is created for dog lovers and is not a real dog translator. It is made for entertainment purposes only.
Attention: If your dog reacts badly to this game or it causes unpleasant dog reactions, please stop using it so as not to harm your pet.

Note that free version of the game is limited to:
– 5 Dog Bark Sounds;
– 1 Translation;
– 1 Whistle.
If you want to use the game without limits an auto-renewable subscription ”Dog Translator Premium” is available.

 Auto-renewable Subscription ”Dog Translator Premium” Info:
By subscribing you get premium (full, unlimited) access to all the features and content offered by Dog Translator game.

Auto-renewable Subscription “Dog Translator Premium” Includes:
– Unlock All Bark Sounds;
– Unlimited Translations;
– Unlimited Whistles;

The game contains the following auto-renewable subscription called ”Dog Translator Premium”:
– Weekly (0,99 US$) with a 3-days for free period.
* Subscription price may vary depending on your location;
* Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase;
* Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period;
* Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal;
* Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account;
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/dog-translator-privacy
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/dog-translator-terms

Requested Access:
Microphone – access to record your speech and translate it into dog language.
